name: TomballISDSchoolCalendar
0:
”Alexa, ask Tomball I.S.D. when is the next day off?”
”Alexa, ask Tomball I.S.D. do the kids have school tomorrow.”
”Alexa, ask Tomball I.S.D. when do the kids have off in March?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tomball i.s.d.
des: This skill is for residents in the Tomball Independent School District. Ask Alexa questions about the school Calendar. You can ask Alexa if the kids have school tomorrow. You can ask Alexa if there is school on a specific date. You can also ask Alexa if the kids have any days off next week, or in a certain month. You can also ask when is the next day off and when is the first or last day of school.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
